description: Users of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46 may experience issues with input handling after installing input-related updates addressed in CVE-2023-5486. This behavior could manifest as unexpected input recognition, causing delays or inaccuracies in typing or command execution. System administrators should monitor user feedback for signs of input disruptions, which indicate that the browser's functionality might be impaired until the latest updates, as documented in the KB article associated with version 118.0.2088.46, are applied.
